entry.title: New Website Launched
entry.summary: New website launched, powered by Pelican and GitHub pages
entry.content:
After several years of redirecting my domain, alexvancina.com, to my LinkedIn profile, I'm launching a new site powered by Pelican and GitHub Pages. Posts here will probably be infrequent, but I plan to share updates on public library services and technology projects I'm working on.

Feel free to contact me by email or social media if you'd like to get in touch.
